# proto deser example
create proto
```
rustam@rustam-zenbook:~/go-education/proto_test$ cat proto_app.proto 
syntax = "proto3";
option go_package = "./; main";

message Application
{
    uint32 payload = 1;
}
```
generate

```
rustam@rustam-zenbook:~/go-education/proto_test$ protoc -I ./ --go_out=./ ./proto_app.proto 
rustam@rustam-zenbook:~/go-education/proto_test$ head proto_app.pb.go 
// Code generated by protoc-gen-go. DO NOT EDIT.
// versions:
// 	protoc-gen-go v1.36.4
// 	protoc        v5.28.3
// source: proto_app.proto

package main

import (
	protoreflect "google.golang.org/protobuf/reflect/protoreflect"
```
installed modules
```
rustam@rustam-zenbook:~/go-education/proto_test$ cat ../go.mod 
module go-education

go 1.23.5

require (
	github.com/golang/protobuf v1.5.4
	google.golang.org/protobuf v1.36.4
)
```
run example
```
rustam@rustam-zenbook:~/go-education/proto_test$ go run main.go proto_app.pb.go 
Original struct loaded from proto file: payload:10000
Marshalled proto data:  [8 144 78]
Unmarshalled struct:  payload:10000
```
